title: naa moraalakimpa
sahitya:
nA morAlakimpa vEmayyA O rAma rAma nA morAlakimpavEmi



anupallavi



 nA morAlakimpa vEmi nyAyamA prapancamandu svAmi nI kanna nannu santarincuvAra levvaru



caraNam 1



 unnata vidhamu vinnavinciti nA hrdayamandu ninnu maruvakeppuDu nunciti kanna 

taNDrivaina nIku kaThina hrdayamaitE nEnu kanna kanna vArinella gAci gOlvalEnu ipuDu



caraNam 2



 mrokkagAnE mODi sEturA nA pApamella nukkaLinci yUrakundurA dikku evaru 

lEru nIvE dikkaTancu namminAnu ikkaDiki nI kaTAkSa mEla rAkanunna dayayO



caraNam 3



 madamu cEta teliyanaitini pApamancu prithiviyandu encanaitini kadasi nEnu 

cEsinaTTi karmam-anubhavinca valenu idigO nI pAdamula gatiyaTancu namminAnu



caraNam 4



 nI samAna daivamevvaru I lOkamandu nI samAna dhIrulevvaru dAsuDanucu 

bhadrAdrivAsa vEru sEyabOku gAni mAnpumipuDu rAma bhUpa vIra rAghavEndra
